verses.verse: Now <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. And <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.

Now when <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> was risen <S%H6965>up<s%> to the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, he <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> himself, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> all his <S%H251>brethren<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and divers also of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, like as <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%>: for he had the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>: and he <S%H6213>wrought<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Howbeit the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, because of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that he had <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%>, and as he <S%H559>promised<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H5216>light<s%> to him and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.
¶ In his <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> <S%H6586>revolted<s%> from under the <S%H3027>dominion<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H4427>made<s%> themselves a <S%H4428>king<s%>.

So the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> <S%H6586>revolted<s%> from under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>. ¶ And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4385>writing<s%> to him from <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, Because thou hast not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, nor in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>,

Behold, with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4046>plague<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>smite<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, and thy <S%H802>wives<s%>, and all thy <S%H7399>goods<s%>:

¶ Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> against <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and of the <S%H6163>Arabians<s%>, that were <S%H5921%H3027>near<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%>:

And they came <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H1234>brake<s%> into it, and carried <S%H7617>away<s%> all the <S%H7399>substance<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> also, and his <S%H802>wives<s%>; so that there was never a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> him, save <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%>, the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
¶ And <S%H310>after<s%> all this the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>smote<s%> him in his <S%H4578>bowels<s%> with an <S%H369%H4832>incurable<s%> <S%H2483>disease<s%>.

And it came to pass, that in process of <S%H3117>time<s%>, <S%H3318%H6256>after<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3117>years<s%>, his <S%H4578>bowels<s%> fell <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H5973>reason<s%> of his <S%H2483>sickness<s%>: so he <S%H4191>died<s%> of <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H8463>diseases<s%>. <S%H7970>Thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> years <S%H1121>old<s%> was he when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%> without being <S%H2532>desired<s%>.
